verses.verse: "Put the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> to your lips! <S%H2441><s%> Something like an eagle <S%H5404><s%> is over Yahweh <S%H3068><s%>'s house, <S%H1004><s%> because they have broken <S%H5674><s%> my covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and rebelled <S%H6586><s%> against my law. <S%H8451><s%>
They <S%H3478><s%> cry <S%H2199><s%> to me, <S%H430><s%> 'My God, we Israel acknowledge you! <S%H3045><s%>'
Israel <S%H3478><s%> has cast off <S%H2186><s%> that which is good. <S%H2896><s%> The enemy <S%H341><s%> will pursue him. <S%H7291><s%>

They have set up kings, <S%H4427><s%> but not by me. <S%H7786><s%> They have made princes, and I didn't <S%H3045><s%> approve. Of their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> they have made <S%H6213><s%> themselves idols, <S%H6091><s%> that they may be cut off. <S%H3772><s%>

Let Samaria <S%H8111><s%> throw <S%H2186><s%> out his calf <S%H5695><s%> idol! <S%H639><s%> My anger burns <S%H2734><s%> against them! <S%H3808><s%> How long will it be until they are capable <S%H3201><s%> of purity? <S%H5356><s%>

For this is even from Israel! <S%H3478><s%> The workman <S%H2796><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> it, <S%H430><s%> and it is no God; indeed, <S%H5695><s%> the calf of Samaria <S%H8111><s%> shall be broken in pieces. <S%H7616><s%>

For they sow <S%H2232><s%> the wind, <S%H7307><s%> and they will reap <S%H7114><s%> the whirlwind. <S%H5492><s%> He has no standing <S%H7054><s%> grain. <S%H6780><s%> The stalk will yield <S%H6213><s%> no head. <S%H7058><s%> If <S%H194><s%> it does yield, <S%H6213><s%> strangers <S%H2114><s%> will swallow it up. <S%H1104><s%>
Israel <S%H3478><s%> is swallowed up. <S%H1104><s%> Now they are among the nations <S%H1471><s%> like a worthless <S%H2656><s%> thing. <S%H3627><s%>

For they have gone up <S%H5927><s%> to Assyria, <S%H804><s%> like a wild donkey <S%H6501><s%> wandering alone. <S%H909><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> has hired <S%H8566><s%> lovers for himself. <S%H158><s%>

But although they sold <S%H8566><s%> themselves among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> I will now gather <S%H6908><s%> them; <S%H4592><s%> and they begin to waste <S%H2490><s%> away because of the oppression <S%H4853><s%> of the king <S%H4428><s%> of mighty ones. <S%H8269><s%>
Because Ephraim <S%H669><s%> has multiplied <S%H7235><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> for sinning, <S%H2398><s%> they became for him altars <S%H4196><s%> for sinning. <S%H2398><s%>
I wrote <S%H3789><s%> for him the many things <S%H7230><s%> of my law; <S%H8451><s%> but they were regarded <S%H2803><s%> as a strange thing. <S%H2114><s%>

As for the sacrifices <S%H2076><s%> of my offerings, <S%H1890><s%> they sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> and eat <S%H398><s%> it; <S%H3068><s%> But Yahweh doesn't <S%H7521><s%> accept them. <S%H2142><s%> Now he will remember their iniquity, <S%H5771><s%> and punish <S%H6485><s%> their sins. <S%H2403><s%> They will return <S%H7725><s%> to Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

For Israel <S%H3478><s%> has forgotten <S%H7911><s%> his Maker <S%H6213><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> palaces; <S%H1964><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%> has multiplied <S%H7235><s%> fortified <S%H1219><s%> cities; <S%H5892><s%> but I will send <S%H7971><s%> a fire <S%H784><s%> on his cities, <S%H5892><s%> and it will devour <S%H398><s%> its fortresses. <S%H759><s%>"
